messages.title: STAND UP FOR BRITAIN
messages.content: As your Prime Minister and these negotiations begin, I am standing up for Britain to guarantee our economic security, our national security and our place in the world.

messages.title: STAND WITH ME TO HELP STRENGTHEN MY BREXIT HAND
messages.content: I’m asking you to stand with me to help strengthen my hand in the negotiations to secure the best possible deal from Brexit.

messages.title: STAND UP FOR THE BRITISH PEOPLE, AND FIGHT FOR THE BRITISH PEOPLE
messages.content: With Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister, there will be no attempt to put controls on immigration. And there will be no respect for the will of the British people.

messages.title: MY COMMITMENT TO YOU AND TO BRITAIN
messages.content: I am committed to providing the strong and stable leadership our country needs at this crucial time, and my commitment is to make Brexit a success and make life better for all.

messages.title: DON’T RISK JEREMY CORBYN MESSING UP BREXIT
messages.content: Giving Jeremy Corbyn the keys to Downing Street and our Brexit negotiations risks everything we hold dear and would be a disaster for Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensuring a strong stance in negotiations to secure the best possible deal.
Guarantee economic security through strong leadership.
Strengthen national security to protect the country.
Provide more funding and support for the NHS.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The electorate’s decision will affect Brexit negotiations and Britain’s future.

issues.immigration: With Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister, there will be no attempt to put controls on immigration.

images.caption: Rt. Hon Theresa May, Prime Minister of the United Kingdom
